Key Match Events: Croatia and Albania fought out a thrilling 2-2 draw in a Euro 2024 encounter on Wednesday.
Mateo Kovacic (Croatia) had a left footed shot from the centre of the box saved in the top centre of the goal in the 90'+8'.
Post-Match Reflections: Lowly Albania held Croatia to a 2-2 draw in a thrilling Euro 2024 encounter on Wednesday that left both teams fighting it out for progression to the knockout stage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Volksparkstadion in Hamburg, Germany, with an attendance of 46,784.
The referee for the match was Francois Letexier.
Others: Andrej Kramaric - 74' scored for Croatia, Klaus Gjasula - 76' scored an OG for Croatia, Qazim La√ßi - 11' and Klaus Gjasula - 90'+5' scored for Albania.
